email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, available with a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 280m. The laycan is 15-20 October. Our starting freight quote is in the low 50s, say $50.75 per metric ton. Let me know your thoughts. Best regards, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit on the higher side. Given the current market, would you consider mid-40s, say $45.50 per metric ton? Also, can you confirm the laytime and demurrage terms? Best, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I understand your position, but $45.50 is quite tight given the current bunker prices. However, I can offer $48.00 per metric ton as a middle ground. Laytime is 72 hours total, and demurrage is $20,000 per day pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the revised offer. $48.00 is still a bit high for us. Could you stretch to $47.00? Also, can we extend the laytime to 96 hours? The demurrage rate is acceptable. Looking forward to your reply. Best, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, after discussing with the owners, we can agree to $47.25 per metric ton and extend the laytime to 96 hours. Demurrage remains at $20,000 per day. If this works for you, I’ll draft the charter party agreement. Let me know. Best, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $47.25 and 96 hours laytime works for us. Please proceed with drafting the charter party agreement. Thanks for your flexibility. Best, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear! I’ll prepare the charter party agreement and send it over for your review by end of day. Thanks for the smooth negotiation. Best, Sarah.
